title: How Can You Tell if a Champion is Eligible for Hextech Chests?
body: I know the details on how to get one, (i.e. you can only get one per champion, per season, and  you need to own the champion) but the website says you can find which ones you're eligible for on the champion page of the summoner profile. I'm not sure as to how you find the exact thing that says that you have or haven't gotten the chest for this season with that particular champion. however, I know that when you hover over the champions, it shows a chest that's either bronze or silver.

replies.body:
There are two ways.

1.) Hovering over their icon and seeing a bronze chest means you have gotten a chest with them.

2.) There is a special golden border around a champion's icon if you have gotten a chest with them.

Thanks a lot! I wasn't sure how exactly, but I was on the right track! thanks for clarifying.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Zombiemaster provided some great information here, and I'm glad it helped!  I also wanted to mention that you will need to own the champion to unlock a chest. It's most likely that they can but they have more important things that need to be added to the game before this feature.

Besides I'm pretty sure everyone can remember what champs they earned chests with.

It could definitely be a bit more conspicuous though, which would help for people like me, that have no idea what they're doing though. They should also show statistics about you with that champion for the season on the champion select screen (e.g. average K/D/A for the season.)

I think that your Hextech Crafting guides that you have are good, but are general in some places, and have left me wondering things like this. I believe that a more in-depth guide would help with the more complex ins-and-outs of the crafting system, especially because it isn't a year old yet, which may help new players, and people that are trying to figure out certain parts of the crafting system. As an example, there is nothing specifically stating that hovering over your champions on the champion screen of the summoner profile will show a chest indicative of your eligibility for a chest; it's rather vague in my opinion.
